alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 24 at 3:05PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Grant, Natchitoches, northeastern Sabine, central Winn Parishes in north central Louisiana and east central Sabine Counties through 400 PM CST... At 304 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Natchitoches to 8 miles east of Hemphill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Milam, Many, Hemphill, Campti, Montgomery, Allen, Florien, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Goldonna, Calvin, Fisher, Robeline, Atlanta, Powhatan, Sikes and Kisatchie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
